libraries.name: langchain
libraries.description: Framework for developing applications with LLMs - THE MOST IMPORTANT FOR GENAI
libraries.notes: Most comprehensive LLM framework - need full coverage of chains, agents, memory, tools, integrations. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: pydantic
libraries.description: Data validation using Python type annotations - ESSENTIAL FOR AI DATA PIPELINES
libraries.notes: Comprehensive coverage needed: API docs, concepts, examples, tutorials, configuration, best practices. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: fastapi
libraries.description: Modern, fast web framework for building APIs - PERFECT FOR AI API ENDPOINTS
libraries.notes: Comprehensive coverage needed: tutorials, API reference, advanced topics, examples, deployment patterns. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: openai
libraries.description: OpenAI API client - DIRECT INTEGRATION WITH GPT MODELS
libraries.notes: Direct GPT integration - need all models, endpoints, streaming, fine-tuning, best practices

libraries.name: transformers
libraries.description: Hugging Face Transformers - LOCAL LLM DEPLOYMENT AND FINE-TUNING
libraries.notes: Local LLM deployment - need all models, tokenizers, pipelines, training, optimization

libraries.name: chromadb
libraries.description: Vector database for AI applications - EMBEDDING STORAGE AND RETRIEVAL
libraries.notes: Critical for RAG systems - need full coverage of collections, embeddings, queries, persistence, deployment patterns. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: llamaindex

libraries.notes: Advanced RAG framework that LLMs struggle with - need comprehensive coverage of data connectors, indices, query engines, agents, deployment. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: streamlit
libraries.description: Rapid AI app development and deployment - PROTOTYPING TO PRODUCTION
libraries.notes: AI app deployment framework - need tutorials, components, deployment, performance optimization, production patterns. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: gradio
libraries.description: Simple ML model deployment interfaces - QUICK AI DEMOS TO PRODUCTION
libraries.notes: ML model deployment framework - need components, interfaces, deployment, hosting, production scaling. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: flask

libraries.notes: Simple web framework for AI APIs - need tutorials, extensions, deployment, production patterns, security. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: django
libraries.description: Full-featured web framework - ENTERPRISE AI APPLICATIONS
libraries.notes: Enterprise web framework for AI apps - need tutorials, models, admin, deployment, production, scaling, security. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: langsmith
libraries.description: LangChain observability platform - PRODUCTION MONITORING AND DEBUGGING
libraries.notes: Critical for production LLM monitoring - need tracing, debugging, evaluation, deployment, best practices. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: prometheus
libraries.description: Metrics collection and monitoring - INFRASTRUCTURE OBSERVABILITY
libraries.notes: Infrastructure monitoring for AI systems - need installation, configuration, metrics, alerting, integration with AI apps. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

libraries.name: grafana
libraries.description: Data visualization and monitoring - AI SYSTEM DASHBOARDS
libraries.notes: Monitoring dashboards for AI systems - need installation, dashboards, panels, data sources, alerting, AI-specific metrics. Enhanced pipeline will handle intelligent crawling without arbitrary limits.

metadata.description: Comprehensive GenAI library collection focusing on deployment, monitoring, and complex RAG systems
metadata.notes: Expanded collection targeting areas where LLMs struggle: deployment patterns, production monitoring, complex RAG systems, and operational concerns. High page limits ensure comprehensive coverage of deployment and production patterns.
